answers.answer: I don't know what the ultrasound results mean, but would not be too pleased with those hCG numbers, in your position. (Don't think Fertility Blend could have had an effect like this -- if it was so powerful, it would be more famous.)  Good luck, and I'll be crossing my fingers for you --  Annie

I found out I was pregnant last week and this is my fourth pregnancy. I have had three miscarriages. Two were d and c's and one was a regular misscarriage. All throughout the first three preg. all they could see was the gestational sac and nothing inside of it at 6 and 7 weeks I have been scared to death for the past week about this pregnancy, but today i went for my first us and when they started to do it I started to cry I was terrified to know what I was going to see or not going to see. But too mine and my husbands suprise there was a yolk sac and it had a heart beat. I know what you are goign through right now being scared to death. But think positive that's all you can do in these situations is think positive.  I'm still terrified because my last lpm was may 23 and my us only measured at 5 weeks 6 days and I should be close to 8 weeks. So I haver to get another u/s on next monday. I will be praying for you but please keep your head high. Love Angel

question: I found out that I was pregnant on 06/07/06 and according to the first day of my last period I should be around 10 wks prego.  I went for my first u/s on 07/12/06.  The tech saw a sac measuring 6 wks 4 days but no baby and no hb.  My HCG levels on 06/07 was 166, 06/30 it was 13000, and on 07/12 it was 22000.  The tech said that the fluid level was good.  I am really worried because my daughter was born in 03/05 at 26 weeks and only lived for 11 hours due to no fluid around her and placenta abruption.  My son was born in 11/02 at 36 weeks because of low fluid and is a healthy little 3-yr-old.  I had 3 m/c before my son was conceived, I have diabetes, and sometimes high BP.  I do not know what to think at this point.  I was taking Fertility Blend trying to get pregnant and do not know if it made my cycle screwed up or not.  Has anyone ever taken fertily blend?  What could the ultrasound results mean.  I need answers before I go crazy.  My OB will not even see my until 07/24/06 even though I am high risk.
title: Worried about pregnancy!
